casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

July, 1985

(July 12, 1985) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v Charles W. Shortridge, Jr., Appellant.

Upon remittitur *692from the Court of Appeals, judgment unanimously affirmed. (Remittitur from Court of Appeals of judgment of Oneida County Court, Darrigrand, J. — manslaughter, first degree.) Present — Hancock, Jr., J. P., Callahan, Doerr and Denman, JJ.
